Judul: OPERATIONAL RISK MANAGEMENT IN FLEXIBLE INTERMEDIATE BULK CONTAINER (FIBC) PRODUCTION PROCESS
Abstrak: Risks happen anywhere, including in business. Every company faces risk in their business activity. One of the risks is operational risk. Operational risk is everywhere in the business environment. It is the oldest risk that any company faces. It is among the most devastating and the most difficult to anticipate. It appearances can result in sudden reduction in the value of firm.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Ir. Achmad Herlanto Anggono MBA.
Kata Kunci: Operational risk, risk management, FIBC production
